title: [Project] India in 2050
selftext:
I'm working on a book with the same title: "**India in 2050**". I'm hoping to publish it by August 2025. I'm reserving the next 12 months for research and reaching out to as many Indians as possible. 27 years is not a long period in a nation's life, but it's not too small. A lot of significant goals can be achieved only if our efforts are focused and directed. 

I'm getting started with this research with a small survey. **Please fill out the survey below.** Please ensure that you **don't put any personal information** that can be traced back to you - [https://forms.gle/4iSrxWYK3j6Tm2jg6](https://forms.gle/4iSrxWYK3j6Tm2jg6)
